properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dina dinamu needu prema ruchi choochu chunnaanu Daya gala jeevaahaaramutho poshinchu chunnaavu Deva nee jeeva jalamu naa kitchitivi Nee divya prema naalo uppengenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa paadamulanu neevu bandapai nilipitivi Naa yadugula nella neevu stira parachina devudavu Devaa ! naa kaashrayudavu neeve kadaa Nee divya prema naalo uppengenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siluvalo nee rakhtamu kaarchi nannu rakshinchitivi Saarvathrika sanghamulona nannaikya parachitivi Devaa ! nee daya naa yedala atchyunnathamu Nee divya prema naalo uppengenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaghdhanamulanu naalo neraverchina o prabhuvaa Viduvaka naa yedala needu krupa joopu chunnaavu Devaa ! nee maarani prema sampoornamu Nee divya prema naalo uppangenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mrutini gelchi maa korakai thirigi lechina prabhuvaa Maakorakai thwaralo raanai yunna mahima raajaa Devaa ! nee sannidhi naaku enthopriyamu Nee divya prema naalo uppengenu{/lang-eng}
